channel.title: Compile
channel.description: My compiler seems to not be working it says the system cannot find the path specified help? does this matter? btw I know next to nothing about coding and I'm not that smart so don't criticise(<- i know i spelled that wrong) me. Thanks-Flow

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @PureFlow PureFlow
item.description:
@PureFlow wrote:

K i get it i fixed it thanks but i got a new problem!!! Sad I know so im trying to edit items on my character even though there suppose to be the ::item(id)(amount of item you want) command … for some reason its not working. So when I go to the server and go to characters my character isnt there!? I don’t know where its being stored any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Compile
item.description:
@411 wrote:

yes it does matter, if it cant find the path specified then you cant compile your server, witch means you cant make any changes or updates pretty much… Right click on your compiler and click edit, then you should see something like this: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe. At the beggining. you see where it says “jdk1.6.0_12”? Lets say yours says 12 at the end, you would change it to your jdk like lets say you had jdk 20… then you would put 20 in there. Also, sorry if you dont really understand what im saying, im not really good at explaining stuff =.

But here is a link to a TUT on how to start a server, it shows you the whole 9 yards on how to set everything up:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
